CustomField.formula: IF( Quantity < Applied_Product_Discount__r.First_Range__c, Applied_Product_Discount__r.First_Range_Value__c, IF( Quantity < Applied_Product_Discount__r.Second_Range__c, Applied_Product_Discount__r.Second_Range_Value__c, IF( Quantity < Applied_Product_Discount__r.Third_Range__c, Applied_Product_Discount__r.Third_Range_Value__c, IF( Quantity < Applied_Product_Discount__r.Fourth_Range__c, Applied_Product_Discount__r.Fourth_Range_Value__c, IF( Quantity < Applied_Product_Discount__r.Fifth_Range__c, Applied_Product_Discount__r.Fifth_Range_Value__c, Applied_Product_Discount__r.Sixth_Range_Value__c ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Applied Product Discount Price
